item.title: Five design principles
item.description: We’re building a new ‘Digital Stage’ for the Royal Opera House, responding to and preparing for a new world where the majority of our growing audience is no longer in our cherished theatres, but in cinemas, homes, schools, on the train. We want to do justice to the spectacular opera and ballet performances that are recorded and streamed from Covent Garden, by focusing hard on quality (audio and video capture and encoding; low latency streaming; player optimisations) and by reducing as much friction as possible between our passionate audience and our wonderful content.
